reviews.customers_say: Customers like the sweater's vibrant colors, cute design, and high quality, with one mentioning it holds up well in the wash. They find it warm, with one customer noting it's perfect for ski trips, and appreciate that it's not itchy. The sizing receives mixed feedback - while some say it fits true to size, others find it a little short.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it!
items.body: This sweater is so amazing, looks expensive and I get so many compliments on it. I love it. it's a bit oversize just like the picture shows, I am 5 ft 120 lbs and loved the fit. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute
items.body: Bought for a work Apres Ski Party. Not as long as I thought it would be (I am a size 12 w large chest bought large) so I ended up wearing black pants and not leggings as originally planned but it really stood out and it’s perfect for future winter ski trips. Read more
items.author: terrin adair sullivan

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars CUTE sweater, perfect for ski szn, but be prepared for it to arrive with an unusual, strong smell.
items.body: MUST WASH before wear! I cannot describe the odor, but this sweater (which I otherwise LOVE: it's better-made than I anticipated, fits well, and pairs with jeans to leggings) will arrive with a STRONG smell that is not going to be good to wear straight out the bag. Wash first, follow washing instructions, and voila! Your sweater is good to go. Read more
items.author: Gabrielle S. Martin

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute!!
items.body: I have been eyeing the “ski” and “apres ski” sweaters but they can be so expensive! I got this one as it wasn’t too pricey and looked pretty cute. It is oversized, but super cute nonetheless! Not itchy either like some other sweaters. Read more
items.author: Hunter

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars true to size
items.body: I bought this sweater for my most recent trip to Lake Tahoe and it was absolutely perfect. Loved the quality and fit. Also received multiple compliments. Read more
items.author: Absolutely love this foundation!!! It is a buildable foundation with a satin finish. It left my skin glowing and lasted all day. Just as good if not better than my high end foundations and the price is even better. 10/10.

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars NOT oversized, TOO Short, Sleeves Too Short, Not At All Like the Picture
items.body: This sweater is not at all like the picture. I wish businesses would be banned from using AI or photo-shopped photos. The sweater does say "ski" on it, but that's where the similarity ends. The sweater is NOT AT ALL oversized. I am usually a small or medium. I sized up to a large and it fits kind of snugly. Not at all what I was expecting. The size does not in any way match the sizing chart. The sweater is TOO SHORT, and not at all long like the photo depicts. Not for wearing with leggings as I had hoped. The ARMS ARE TOO SHORT and too tight and I have normal arms and skinny arms. The neck is super small going over my head (I have a small head). I do believe that this is the same sweater as SHEIN sells for ten bucks. It's probably sized based on small sized standards. I am going to try to return this. Read more
items.author: Figaro Finley

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cozy, high quality sweater
items.body: Great sweater! Looks exactly like the designer one (show me your mumu) at a fraction of the price. Thick, super cute, vibrant colors, lots of compliments. Read more
items.author: Oceanbreeze

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Cheap material
items.body: Cute design but material is very cheap. Paid $39 for it on Amazon and found it at Tjmaxx for $6 Read more
items.author: Eileen Dugan

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Khaki, Pink, Purple, Black and White, Navy Blue, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
